idea:
I have identified the need to provide Consulting Services in two fields in which I possess industry-wide expertise and qualifications. 


1. Providing Inclusion and Diversity Consulting, Training, Workshops, etc to government, nonprofits and corporate entities so that they can get sensitized and become more inclusive to minority populations in India like Women, LGBTIQ+ population, specially-abled people, army veterans, etc. in their hiring, managing, staffing, etc. activities while making them feel belonged in the mainstream.

I have imparted Inclusion and Diversity Consulting services to various corporates in the US, Asia Pacific, and Australia.


2. Provide Blockchain-based solutions to Supply chain problems in India across sectors. I am a Certified Blockchain and Supply Chain Professional (certification number 22127614 from the BlockChain Council) with 14+ years of experience in supply chains across product lines, industries, and geographies. 


I have incorporated a sole proprietorship (UDYAM-MH-18-0006489) as a research and consulting body under which I can loop in like-minded researchers and practitioners of Diversity and Inclusion and Blockchain Technology (two separate verticals) and provide the necessary solutions to government, non-profit and corporate entities. 


My education and experience details are as under:


EDUCATION: 

MBA (International Business), Indian Institute of Foreign Trade

B.Tech (Mechanical Engineering), Jamia Millia Islamia

Certified Blockchain and Supply Chain Professional, BlockChain Council


EXPERIENCE:

14+ Years onsite and offsite experience in Supply Chain Management, Strategic Procurement, Supplier Diversity, Diversity and Inclusion across Industries (Agricultural, FMCG, Pharmaceutical, Manufacturing, Chemicals, etc), Companies (Cargill, GEP, Kellogg, etc.) and Geographies (India, US, Australia, Germany, UK, South Africa, Thailand, Korea, Malaysia, Japan, etc.)


Linkedin profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kanishkachaudhry/
name: Samavesh Research and Consulting Solutions

idea:
Unkooked is a solution that focuses on consumers for their hassles before cooking their meals. 

Cumbersome tasks such as venturing out of the home, waiting in the queue at your favourite poultry shop or vegetable vendors, buying other necessary products which are pre-requisites for cooking a meal, and last but not the least cleaning of those products before cooking. 

The above tasks are time-consuming and exhaustive moreover for some non-vegetarian consumers, it is a complete turn-off as the site of the poultry shop and blood stained products is difficult to unsee.

Unkooked covers customers with all the mundane hassles, saving valuable time and making cooking stress-free.

Products provided from us qualify freshness, purity, and sanity tests.


Using Unkooked App consumers of all age can order required items using its easy app interface in a few steps-

1. Choose items required

2. Select preferred delivery time for scheduled order

3. Pay as per your choice of payment mode

4. Order is placed
name: Unkooked
